entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
